Tag_Imageneed.description: ''[[The Fate of Atlantis | Assassin's Creed: Odyssey — The Fate of Atlantis]]''

MemoryInfobox.description: 'Exploring Atlantis to the fullest was a privilege in this mysterious land. To safely enter the Isu Gateways - barriers to private information - Kassandra would need to gather enough Isu codex|Isu Knowledge in order to see through this veil of secrets.'
MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey' – 'The Fate of Atlantis: Judgment of Atlantis'
MemoryInfobox.next: The Fate of Atlantis (memory)|The Fate of Atlantis

General_Description: '''Wisdom of the Ancients''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra set out to gather knowledge from helping citizens, finding data caches and [[Keeper's Insight]]s, and scanning [[Isu codex|Isu codices]].
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra scans her first Isu [[Precursor box|data cache]].
* '''Kassandra''': ''What… what was in that box? My body is tingling like mad. There must be more of these somewhere.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra gathered enough Isu Knowledge to reach Knowledge Sequence 1, which allowed her to travel through more [[Isu Gateway]]s. She then went ahead and gathered more knowledge to reach Sequence 2 and 3.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]'' – ''[[The Fate of Atlantis: Judgment of Atlantis]]''
